faq.rightSectionTitle: Still Need Help?123dgfdshgfh sdg sdgs gshdfhnh

_x0031_.question: How can I get a copy of my financial responsibility card (Proof of Insurance)?
_x0031_.text: California policyholders can view, save, and print a Proof of Insurance card by clicking on the “View Proof of Insurance Card" link on the My Account homepage or the View Policy Details page. This document is in an Adobe® Acrobat® Portable Document Format (PDF). You can download a free copy of Adobe® Acrobat® Reader directly from the Adobe website.

_x0032_.question: How can I get details on my other policies?
_x0032_.text: For additional information on policies other than the ones shown in My Account, please contact our Member Services Center.

_x0033_.question: How do I submit my insurance questionnaire online to qualify for the Verified Mileage Discount on my auto policy renewal?
_x0033_.text:
To qualify for the Verified Mileage Discount before we issue your auto policy renewal, you can access and submit your auto insurance questionnaire (IQ) online by doing one of the following:

 

Log in to My Account and click on the “Submit Your Insurance Questionnaire” link in the auto insurance section.

Go to the Auto Insurance Questionnaire Policy Authentication page. You will be asked to provide your auto policy number and the last 4 digits of your driver license to access and submit your insurance questionnaire.

 

If you have any issues accessing your auto insurance questionnaire online, or if you have questions related to your insurance questionnaire, please call our Member Services Center for assistance.
